summary: Implemented Phases 1-3 of reflexive forward_F approach: weakened forward_F/backward_P to reflexive witnesses, dropped AddCommGroup constraints, built BFMCS on canonical quotient. Phase 4 blocked by quotient representative mismatch preventing forward_F/backward_P proofs.
review_reason: Phase 4 blocked: quotient representative mismatch prevents forward_F/backward_P proofs. canonical_forward_F gives witness W with phi ∈ W, but quotient representative s.repr may differ from W, and phi doesn't propagate between mutually CanonicalR-related MCSes.

artifacts.summary: Implementation summary for reflexive forward_F approach (Phases 1-3 complete, Phase 4 partial)
Canonical BFMCS construction with forward_G/backward_H proofs (forward_F/backward_P have sorries)

blockers: Quotient representative mismatch: phi ∈ W does not imply phi ∈ s.repr.world
Resolution options: generalize to Preorder, hybrid construction, or OrderIso to Int
